title: dixi12
author: dixi12
content: Bridge Network is a cross-chain protocol enabling seamless transactions across 15 blockchains. Bridge Network has a mission to interconnect ecosystems and communities across the defi. The current cross-chain landscape is complex with tools that aren't built for the average user, but with Bridge Network it's beautifully simplified.If anyone is interested, they can see more at the following links:Website: https://www.bridgenetwork.com/Telegram: https://t.me/BridgeNetwork0xTwitter: https://twitter.com/bridgenetwork0xDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/PGHnWapB8uReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/bridgenetwork0x/Crew3- https://bridgenetwork.crew3.xyz/questboard

comments.author: dixi12
comments.body: What happened in November?Bridge Pay - A non-custodial multichaindebit card for everyoneThe Bridge Socket - plug & play developer tool to enable cross-chain bridging functionalities into any                    dApp.Bridge x OKX- collaboration with OKC Chain. Bridgoors have had multiple opportunities to earn some cool                    prizes in a series of eventsCommunity Updates- In November, the community had a month full of actions: joining the Crew3                   platform, quiz  masters, meme Mondays…… research for yourself on the following links:Website: https://www.bridgenetwork.com/Telegram: https://t.me/BridgeNetwork0xTwitter: https://twitter.com/bridgenetwork0xDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/PGHnWapB8uReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/bridgenetwork0x/Crew3- https://bridgenetwork.crew3.xyz/questboard
